text: yam kenek niwanmanga gana hondin igena gathwita ohuta bhagyawathun wahanse gaurawayen asuru karannata puluwankama thibenawa.

ehidi mawa beheth aran dennath, ayiyata apa denanth kiya polisiyata upedes di thibenawa.
